Lawn mower thatss: This lawn mower iss-shaped and can navigate around obstacles easily. It uses a combination of GPS and sensors to map out the lawn and create an efficient mowing pattern.

Lawn mower with built-in speakers: This lawn mower comes with built-in speakers that can play music or audiobooks while you mow the lawn. You can connect your phone to the speakers and stream your favorite tunes.
Lawn mower with a built-in cooler: This lawn mower comes with a built-in cooler that can hold drinks and snacks. You can enjoy a refreshing drink while you mow the lawn.
Lawn mower with a built-in vacuum cleaner: This lawn mower comes with a built-in vacuum cleaner that can clean up leaves and debris on your lawn. You can switch between mowing and vacuuming easily.

Lawn mower with a built-in grill: This lawn mower comes with a built-in grill that can cook burgers, hot dogs, and other grilled foods. You can cook dinner while you mow the lawn and enjoy a meal with your family.
